item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

I ended up doing it myself >.>

if(NPCID == 3118){    					
	int cNpc = 3118;   		
	int cItm = 981;   						
	
	
	if(donator >= 1){
		if(playerHasItem(cItm)){
			talk2("You have escaped the jail.", " With the Ring of Returning.", cNpc); //TODO 4
			stillgfx(86, absY, absX);
            toX = 3051;
			toY = 3491;
			action = 0;
            sM("You have been unjailed by the Ring of Returning."); //TODO 5
			//deleteItem(cItm, 1);
		//TODO 6~
		} else {
			talk2("You bitch don't have the item", "(Ring of Returning or something?).", cNpc);
		}
	} else {
		talk2("You don't have donator!", "Go donate now if you want to escape jail without mining!", cNpc); 
	}
}

item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

ActionHandler; firstClickNPC();

case PETE:
    if (c.isJailed()) {
        if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(DISK, 1)) {
            c.getDH().sendDialogues(200, npcType);
        } else {
            c.getDH().sendDialogues(201, npcType);
        }
    } else {
        c.getDH().sendDialogues(202, npcType);
    }
break;

Remember to fix the PETE case, the isJailed() boolean, if you use a different one, and the DISK constant.

Next, for the dialogues.
DialogueHandler; sendDialogues();

case 200:
    sendStatement2("You may leave the Jail, as you currently have a Disk of Returning.", "");
    c.newInt = 1;
break;
case 201:
    sendStatement2("You do not have a Disk of Returning, so you must", "stay in Jail.");
    c.newInt = 2;
break;
case 202:
    sendStatement2("I am in charge of managing jailed players.", "I currently have no time to talk.");
    c.newInt = 3;
break;

Remember to declare newInt = 0; in Player class.

Now, for the actions.
ClickingButtons;

case actionButtonID:
    if(c.newInt == 0)
	    return;
    if(c.newInt == 1) {
	    c.getItems().deleteItem(DISK, 1);
		c.sendMessage("You are no longer in Jail.");
		c.sendMessage("Please abide by the rules.");
		c.isJailed = false;
		c.getPA().movePlayer(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
	} else if(c.newInt == 2) {
	    c.sendMessage("You need a Disk of Returning to leave Jail.");
		return;
	} else if(c.newInt == 3) {
	    return;
	}
break;

That should be it.

If I missed anything, please remind me.

Read full topic
